alert.note: Alert for Iberia; St. Martin; St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 4:05PM CDT until May 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Iberia Parish in south central Louisiana... North central St. Mary Parish in south central Louisiana... Central St. Martin Parish in south central Louisiana... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 404 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jeanerette, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Iberia, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Baldwin, Loreauville, Sorrel, Lydia, Lake Fausse Pointe and Charenton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
